tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
No Improvements required  .*** ** *** **** ** *** *********** After going through various gynecologist ,it was my fortune to meet her. My wife had not so good first time pregnancy, so in second time i was more worried and looking for doctor who justified the phrase doctors are equivalent to god.


And my wife is delighted after meeting her and she knows our babys in safe hand.
Second month is going on will update further later.

Now planning to take the package as doctors presence delight me and my wife .And it gives  a great confidence.

I am updating the review due to the kind of love she has provided during pregnancy. During 2nd trimester my wife diagnosed  with dengu. And i had no other option to rush dr Poornima to save baby and mother. And after seeing my wife's condition she had taken full responsibility. And adviced hospital staff for full attention. And she used to visit twice to see the improvement with the treatment. And i came to know that my baby is in safe hand. 

And during third trimester ,my wife diagnosed with diabetes. Firstly she convinced my wife that nothing can harm you. And she started giving full attention to my wife in every visit. And slowly with proper examination we progressed to the 9th month of pregnancy  . As we were having bad past with normal delivery .We asked doctor for c section. Then she explained us the pros and cons of normal delivery and c section. She clearly told us as normal delivery has various advantage ,i cant ignore it. But she had given us faith that ,in any emergency we will plan for c section. So on the delivery day, due to water leakage we got admitted early .As it was indication of normal delivery pain ,we got admitted early.And we waited for 4 hours for pain to increase as water loss was more and chances of something serious damage was there. As confirmed earlier by the doctor , she would act according to patient conditon. And she  decided for c section. And she has already arranged all experts from hospital as precautions due to past history. And the operation was successful .And she came back with smiley face to inform us the successful delivery of baby.

And i am writing all this to show my gratitude for her. She cared us like her own child from the beginning till end.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: ** *** **** *** ** *** ******** I’m writing this review on behalf of my wife Aruna. We met Dr Poornima after referral from one of my friend. We started consulting doctor from the third month of our pregnancy. We were in confusion whether to continue the old doctor or should we consult Dr Poornima. In this dilemma our 3rd month scan got delayed by 2 days. AfTer so much thinking we opted for Dr Poornima. Our first visit she saw our last doctor’s case sheet. And asked our 3rd month scan details, we said we are planing to do it here with you. Doc scolded my wife like anything, literally she made my wife cry. Then she explained both of us how important to do the scans on the exact dates, in particularly the 3rd month scan. I asked my wife due to want continue with this doctor. My wife said I want this Doctor only. After that everything was spl. We enjoyed our parenthood thoroughly. Doctors explains everything. We asked for normal delivery. Doctor supported us so much. My wife was 32 at that time pregnancy and it’s our first baby. Dr Poornima is a strong personality, very strict and informative. If you trust her fully I tell you she will keep up the word what she tells you. No matter what. In the last month doctor gave her personal Whatsapp number too, to be in touch and to answer our doubts. On the delivery day, We went through more than 20 hours of labour. She was monitoring my wife through out the day. My wife couldn’t meet the 10cm opening on the delivery day, doctor being so patiently  waited and waited. If it’s any other doctor they would have performed the C section. Then finally she performed normal delivery to my wife. My baby boy weighted 3.8kg, both mother and baby was healthy. I still remember what doctor said after coming out from the OT Big Baby, and my wife is a strong woman. I should tell you one thing our baby birth happened during the first wave of covid. She has been like a family member when we are in hospital. Once you go to her, trust her fully. You may find her very strict. *** *** ** *** **** ** *** ***** True Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
This is a long pending feedback. Dr Poornima justifies the profession she is in and really knows what she is doing. What initially seemed like a high risk pregnancy (I was on bed rest for first 3 months due to bleeding) turned out to be a wonderful experience for me with a normal delivery. The reason I decided to consult her is because of her reputation in normal deliveries.
 
I wouldn’t say I started feeling comfortable from day 1. On the day of our first appointment she had to attend to an emergency delivery in Koramangala clinic and she had to rush. She couldn’t spend too much time. I started thinking how can a patient develop comfort with her doc with just one meeting a month which lasts for not more than 10 or 15 minutes. But in the subsequent appointments I realized that she does give time to patient to ask questions, clarify any kind of doubts even if they are silly. She sticks to basics - healthy food and exercise and active life, doesn’t prescribe unnecessary tests or medicines. She suggested me to continue with my work life as it was before my pregnancy without scaring me anytime due to my bleeding in early pregnancy. During my appointment in the 8th month she said “Very high chances of normal delivery” and we were really excited and little nervous also.. On the D day, we went to the hospital and I delivered under her supervision after almost 20+ hours of labour, which today is one of the most cherished and memorable experiences of my life.

If you are cooperative and realistic in your expectations you can expect the same from her. For e.g. – She runs around 2 clinics and sometimes she could be delayed due to delayed delivery or some complications and she is a human. You cannot expect her to reach your clinic on your appointment time.. 

PS – This is a feedback for Dr Poornima and not Apollo Cradle, Jayanagar, where I delivered.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Thankful and forever grateful to Dr. Poornima Ramakrishna who made me feel so confident and at ease throughout pregnancy and for being so supportive throughout labour and delivery. One knows, pregnancy, delivery and post partum can go either way. But I strongly believe when in good hands of a doctor who is so thorough and patient and helps with a smooth labour, one can only be left with a profound and meaningful birthing experience. Have been recommending Dr.Poornima to all my friends and family circle because of having had such a great experience after consulting her. No unnecessary scans, she is thorough and precise with her diagnosis and instructions. I delivered my baby in Feb 2021 in the hands of Dr.Poornima Ramakrishna and her able team at Apollo Cradle. Was induced to go into labour as I had dilated few cms but wasn't getting natural contractions, post which delivered vaginally without any tear and gentle suturing. She even called my husband into labour room for support and a very dramatic cheer and push required during delivery. My husband and I still cherish when we think of those moments. No looking back for any other gynaecologist after having met Dr.Poornima Ramakrishna. Highly highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dear Sir/ Madam,

Greetings !!!

I wanted to share my BEST Movement of Life with Fortis La Femme  @ Richmond Road BANGALORE. *** ** *** **** ********* *** ******* ******** ***** The whole team at Fortis la femme  (Richmond Road ) is excellent and made sure that all my needs were attended , Specially to Mrs.Irfana  and Mrs Angel (Staff Head ) and Team , ***** **** **** ************* * Attentive for all your queries, and proactive for whatever you ask ,Really thankful from bottom of my heart to Mrs Irfana for ensuring all the promises made recommending **** ****** ,  Entire hospital is having  Excellent nursing staff . Dr. Poornima ramakrishna (For mother) and Dr. Marie Shalini Chico (For Baby)  is one of the most amazing doctors I have come across. The moment  I met her I knew I wouldn't want to consult anyone else other than this wonderful doctors . I hardly worried because I was confident of being in good hands. There is a sense of calmness that they carries around and it puts one at ease considering I am a super anxious. I was guided very well throughout my wife pregnancy process and so glad that we met  Dr. Poornima ramakrishna All the issues related to pregnancy process  were addressed and handled smoothly. Really Appreciate to ambiance of Fortis la femme , Heartily thanks to Dr.Poornima Ramakrishna  and Team . We are blessed with boy baby .

We got excellent package and excellent service I strongly recommend everyone to go ahead with Fortis La femme  Bangalore ,

Wanted to appreciate few special staff of nursing ( Ms.Jhanvi /Ms Radha / Ms.divya/ Ms Ashwini /Ms.Steffy ).

I once again wanted to specially thanks & Appreciation to Mrs Irfana.  Fortis is lucky to have this lady.

And I strongly recommend everyone to go ahead with Dr poornima Ramakrishna  Bangalore , Always 

 I wish good luck and all the best for entire hospital and hospital staff.

Best Regards

Abdul Rahman / Ayesha Sultana

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Dr Ramakrishna for the first time after a recommendation from a friend. I found her to be empathetic and sensible, taking the time to review my medical history in detail. Although I am not qualified to comment on her diagnosis, she explained to me well my concerns related to the last mishap, my current reports, AMH levels, and so on -- in a way that was easy for me to understand. She not only maintained a positive demeanour throughout our interaction, but she kind of also took responsibility for my well-being, in contrast to my previous doctor, Dr Tyagi, who was competent but not particularly invested in my care. Dr Ramakrishna took a more personal interest in my well-being, and I think will be continuing my upcoming sessions with her.

tags: None
review: We visited her since beginning of pregnancy... Initially we met her by mistake... Confused with other doctor.... But once met we knew C is the one....C listens very patiently and address Ur concern logically....Comfort u N give u confidence  .....Wrote min med ... OverallC made our journey blissful... The real she was seen during pregnancy.... Ours was case with zero bishop score....But timely confident decisions N actions of her made our delivery normal which initially seemed impossible....A right person can make Ur life...N I'm sure Dr Poornima is definitely that person.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is a doctor any girl would prefer. Made me feel very comfortable during my pregnancy, which helped me share my experiences/doubts easily with her and she was able to always able to understand, and help very a smile. She boosts your confidence so much that you get ready for normal delivery without any fear. Overall she makes your journey to your motherhood very smooth, happy and a memorable one. Couldn't thank her enough after my delivery. I was so delighted with her service that I was short of words. :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Dr.Poornima in 8th month of mine pregnancy.I was bit reluctant to visit a new doctor at dis stage but bcos of corona cases in other hospitals we decided to visit Dr.Poornima.She saw mine each nd every report very patiently from beginning to dat date nd asked for many tests ...which we had already done.She never asked to repeat any test nor she prescribed unnecessarily medicines.She is very clear about her decisions  regarding patients health .She explains  things in a  crystal clear manner nd tells everything in advance whatever is possible.She doesn't create panic.Even in labour room she was very friendly nd kept on talking to me to make me at ease.As mine was c- section bcos of baby's breach position.Post delivery also she was caring nd doesn't want unnecessarily visit to hospital .I highly recommend Dr.Poornima.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to Dr Poornima for my second pregnancy in hopes that I can have a vbac after a traumatic c-section for my first delivery. She helped me manage my gestational diabetes well, assessed my case and gave me all the support to attempt a vbac. Her diagnosis, knowledge and decisions were on point and timely and I can say that I was able to have a safe vaginal birth after a previous c section to bring my baby girl into this world. It was possible only because of her confidence and support. I trust Dr Poornima with all my heart and I wish her all the best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: This is a long pending post.. Dr. Poornima is my angel doctor. After being married for 6 years and 1 year of unsuccessful infertility treatment, at the verge of opting IVF, I met Dr.Poornima through my neighbour. 3 months into treatment, I got conceived. she was my confidence booster. no unnecessary scans, not much medicines prescribed, only healthy food and a healthy and active lifestyle. Highly recommends normal delivery. Now I have a 15 month old baby girl delivered normally. Thank you so much Mam.! You are our angel!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Hi Dr Poornima,Me and my wife Durena Dey visited you first time after 4 month of her pregnancy and on very first meeting the way you showed us the path was impressive and so clear that we continued with you till delivery .Your suggestions,your way of handling the situation from day one till the delivery is so impactful that we got a cute gift from the god .My wife delivered a healthy baby boy in normal delivery so the comments suggestions given on patro for you is all real.below is the key highlighters for you and I mentioning here so that lots of people get your guidance.1. she listen you give proper time in every visit and explain you all the challenges .2. she give you very few medecine to have that much only which is needed.3. she never give you so many tests to do and I was really impressed bcz initially I was visiting some other doctor but she use to take so many scans and tests.4. She give proper time and enough time for normal delivery.5 she is always give her focus towards normal delivery.Thank you mam * * *** ****

tags: None
review:
I recommend her to everyone who's expecting a baby. Nisha & I are expecting a baby & have been visitiing Poornima Mam for sometime now. Very friendly & nice way of explaining the symptoms. Listens to everything we had to say. All in all a very pleasant experience with her so far.

Thank you Poornima Mam.

Her informed decisions helped me during labour and delivery. Overall a great experience with her and Apollo Cradle Jayanagar Team.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr.poornima from the 7th month of pregnancy. I was not satisfied with my previous doctor and was very skeptical about changing so late into the pregnancy. Turns out it is the best decision I made. The doctor is extremely sorted in her thoughts and diagnosis. she never prescribes anything unwanted and encouraged me to stay active and keep things as natural as possible. my entire delivery process was a smooth one , thanks to her!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor Poornima is one of the most experienced and very friendly doctor. even the difficult problem, she makes it look easy. She supports us and made sure I had a normal and healthy delivery. she doesn't prescribe unwanted medicines. and listens to all our issues and problems very carefully. *** ** * ****** **** ******. I would recommend every pregnant women to visit her. she is amazing

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited her for my first pregnancy from starting and she guided for necessary diet and medications throughout. Around last trimester, I developed obstetric cholestasis for which she gave ******* medication to keep in control.During last stage of labour also, she and her team extra guided and motivated for natural delivery. Finally was blessed with healthy baby through normal delivery. I will always be thankful to her for care and support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: doctor is **** **** *** instructive. doctor always prefers to go normal delivery . doctor never also to do unnecessary tests and medication.  doctor guides us to take the food which solves the problem. ****** ** **** ** ********* * highly recommendable.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Poornima Ramakrishna is very friendly. We visited from the day we found pregnancy is positive till our delivery and post delivery. She is not only providing medicines also educating us what to do at each stage, which will increase our confidence level. We were only followed her instructions and rest she has taken care. Thank you madam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Poornima is very calm headed person whom I can count on pregnancy on any given day. She is thorough in her approach ,avoid unnecessary medication and would encourage natural delivery no matter what. My wife had a complex pregnancy and she handled it perfectly like a champ.I am indebted to her for whole my life for being there for me when it matters most. She took time for my wife out of her busy when she developed allergic pain post delivery and also visited her on Sunday when usually she is not seeing any one. Person with a heart of gold.God bless her!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I wanted to share my experience with Dr. Poornima. *** ***** ************* *** *** *** ********* *********** *********** *** she is not friendly. I have consulted her for four sessions and she has no attachment to the patient, found her behaviour quite indifferent, rude and sarcastic at times and she does not share her phone number for emergency which I found extremely odd for a gynaecologists. *** ***** ******* *** *** ** ******** *** * ****** **** **** ** ***** ** ***** *** ***** **** ** ********** *** ** **** *******

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I want to say my periods are irregular and we are planning for kid.But her response was ur just 30 so wait for 2 more years.I said I been taking medicine for 2years no improvement but still she didt give me any tablets and no medication only folic acid and wait for 6months and more over I had allergy on head for that she said u analyse all ur food and work and apply moisture I said I have it for 2months she says its OK apply something and avoid food which is triggering u find out the reason.** ***** **** * ** * **** * ****** *** **** ** ********* ***** **** * ****** *** *** ******* ******** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,
review:
*** **** ****** **** **** ******** All my concerns on conceiving till the normal delivery is sorted out with one good decision I made to visit her.
She is very very polite and extremely professional. She keeps track of her clients in her Tab.  A doctor of her stature doesn't even need to do this. She explained and advised every minute detail during my pregnancy with so much patience and kept me comfortable and confident all time. And finally when the delivery time approached, she insisted me on normal deliver since I have a chances of having normal delivery. Also she waited all day in the hospital to make this happen, that too over a weekend.. Thanks Dr.Poornima for making this happened to me. Thanks Apollo Cradle Kormangala staff.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We have been visiting Dr. Poornima for last 10 months from initial stages of pregnancy to delivery(NVD). Her positivity and her info on do's and dont's where spot on and inspiring. She broke down a lot of myths and ensured right guidance from nutrition to exercise to lifestyle. Also, inside the labor room the kind of morale and spirit that she drives is second to none. Would highly recommend her for anyone even if you have to travel a little longer.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: We started visiting Dr.Poornima Ramakrishnan right from the starting of my pregnancy and i am glad I did that. No unnecessary tests or medicine done. Absolutely NO non-sense advise and treatment. She always pushed me for a NVD and I delivered under her supervision without any complication. I Highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: Dr Poornima Ramakrishna is a fantastic and a very experienced doctor. When it is your first pregnancy, there is always a thought if you are in the right hands or not. With her you surely are. She does not encourage unnecessary medications and scans. It was always a pleasure visiting her. She was there every time we needed her. She strongly believes in normal delivery and will do what is right for you. Highly recommend Dr Poornima Ramakrishna.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This being my first pregnancy I had my fair share of apprehensions. Thanks to Dr Poornima I was largely relaxed and had a normal delivery. She has a frank approach and takes time to explain the procedures. Also appreciate the way she emphasizes on exercises both before and after delivery, which I felt helped ease the process.
